segments.text: I can't believe how careless the woman is, not noticing the water overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she see the puddle forming around her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're just as bad, trying to sneak cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that stool if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like no one in this kitchen has any common sense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't slipped on the wet floor yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at them to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't even watch, it's making me so mad.
segments.speaker: PAR
